version_description: - Fix playback issues on iPad Air and iPad mini retina.

- FREE MKV playback with hardware-acceleration.
- Supports 2K (2560x1440) and 4K (3840x2160) MKV playback on iPhone 5S, iPad Air and iPad mini retina.
- Fix bugs.

• Support iCloud Drive.
• Better 3D video playback.
• Transfer multiple files via WiFi connection.
• 64-bit optimisation for H264 10-bit, HEVC, HEVC 10-bit, VC-1, VP8 and VP9 decoder.

- Supports HEVC hardware acceleration.
- Supports HDR10+ videos.
- Supports Mac & Windows File Sharing.

- Supports HEVC hardware acceleration.
- Supports HDR10+ videos.
- New user interface.

- Supports HEVC hardware acceleration.
- Supports HDR10+ videos.
- New user interface.
- Fix bugs.
